exercises.instruction: Answer the questions based on the conversation. A refers to the first speaker, B the second.

exercise.question: a) How many siblings does B have? b) What do they do?
exercise.answer:
A: ご兄弟(きょうだい）はいますか。 B: はい、兄（あに）と姉（あね）がいます。 A:お兄（にい）さんも東京にいますか。 B:いいえ、兄（あに）は神戸（こうべ）の会社に勤めています。姉（あね）は東京の高校（こうこう）で英語（えいご）を教（おし）えています。
a) How many siblings does B have? (An older brother and an older sister.) b) What do they do? (Older brother is working for a company in Kobe. Older sister is teaching English at a high school in Tokyo.)
